name: V.E.S.S
description:
V.E.S.S or Very Extreme Space Shooter was my first small hobby project using the Godot Engine.

V.E.S.S presents one simple challenge for you to achieve. reach the score of 100,000 to unlock a secret. Are you up for the challenge?

With just the simple swipe of your mouse, you can fight various aliens that will increase your score, as you collect several power-ups to help turn the tables and change the colour of your ship to your liking.  Are you up for this unique challenge, to find what is waiting for you at the end?

originally VESS was going to be an app for android. due to issues the game has instead remained for windows. However, you can download the apk file and install it on your phone.

any donation would be much appreciated. thanks and enjoy.

Special thanks go to Jordan Drew for the music and Jacob Hilton for extra help.
